idea:
Who said ‚Äúdiabetics can‚Äôt have desserts‚Äù? A Diabetic Chef is here to bury that phrase forever. What started off as a blog with recipes for diabetics and weight-watchers, turned into a full-fledged cloud kitchen serving Mumbai a range of sugar-free brownies and other treats. Founded by our Chef, Harsh Kedia, a 23-year-old entrepreneur who has been living with diabetes since teenage, took it upon himself to promote healthy eating. After diving into some thorough research and product development for some time, we‚Äôre reopening to cure all your woes!


When we started out, we had the intent of creating something of genuine value to the diabetic and health-conscious community. And we still stand on those grounds today. To transform the pleasure of food, into a frisky, guilt-free affair.


Our commitment to crafting this experience has made us shape our brand right from its roots. We believe in being‚Ä¶


Authentic


Real ingredients. No bullshit.

Learn more about our ingredients below.

Fair


Made for all. Made for you.

Passionate


Wrapping smiles for the love of chocolate.

Convenient


Delivering happiness to 20000+ pincodes. Give us a try?

There goes a saying ‚ÄúYou are what you eat‚Äù. But do we even really know anymore what we‚Äôre having?


A Diabetic Chef is here to change the way chocolate works. While using the good ol‚Äô skills of a chocolatier, the innovation is in the ingredients that we use. According to the unbreakable chocolatier code #101, the richness of the cocoa beans must be uncompromised. We use some of the finest West African cocoa beans to not only to stick to that code, but also to see you go ‚Äúmmmm‚Äù when you take that first bite. The cocoa beans are paired with the well-rounded flavour of bourbon vanilla. And much to your delight, we use zero-carb and zero-calorie stevia. 


Chocolate 


Chocolate is one of the most misunderstood foods there is. Many think that it‚Äôs the root to many health problems. But since we‚Äôre devoted to the world of chocolate, let‚Äôs clear some misconceptions, shall we?


In fact, chocolate is good for your health. (Binge-eaters excluded, sorry)


It‚Äôs good for the heart


Dark chocolate improves flexibility in the arteries and helps prevent blood clots.


Improves skin health


Known to reduce sun damage caused by UV rays. (This in no way suggests ditching the sunscreen)


Increases insulin sensitivity


Sounds crazy but flavonoids found in dark chocolate improve insulin resistance. (No we‚Äôre not saying this to just sell our chocolates)


Reduces cholesterol


Antioxidants found in cocoa help fight bad cholesterol.


Brain stimulant


Improves cognition, memory, and of course boosts one‚Äôs mood. üôÇ


Increases immunity


Cocoa can improve the antibodies response of the immune system. 


*Facts stated above are found from scientific studies.


 


Stevia


We use 100% natural stevia. No artificial taste. No nasties.


Stevia is the magical plant that adds the sweet to our sweet treats. And we aren‚Äôt exaggerating in any way when we call it ‚Äúmagical. It‚Äôs a sweetener that in no way will spike your blood sugar levels. Perfect for diabetics and health-conscious peeps out there.


Natural

Zero-calories

Zero-carbs
name: DIABETIC CHEF LLP

idea:
Our Motto is "One Suite For All Insights" means all the reporting types we brought under one umbrella.

We want to cater Data Science And Business Intelligence from small industries to large industries so that every company take smart decision to

grow for their revenue.


Our tool require only basic sql and excel based knowledge so any one smartly use and easy to handle .


Industry require different licensing for reporting purpose.

so that they waste their money as well as time to gain the knowledge of that reporting modules.

To get the rid of this we brought AbleView BI Suite.

which includes  7 report types.

No one any leading BI Software Require if any person purchase our product.

we also include NLP,Narrative Science,Machine Learning Concept.


We have Also Covered Data Analysis Part


1)Descriptive Analysis :- Statistical Analysis, Financial Indicators


2)Diagnostic Analysis - KPI Indicators


3)Predictive Analysis- Forecasting,Python,R etc.


4)Prescriptive Analysis-  NLP, Story Telling



7 Types Reports


1) Lattice Reports: The Lattice Reports is a best-of-breed editing/data shaping component and ships with dozens of high-impact features so you can easily manage information and display it on-screen as business needs dictate.


2) Axle Reports: An Excel-like Axle Reports engineered for multi-dimensional (OLAP) data analysis and cross-tab reporting. Numerous layout customization options give you total control over its UI and unmatched user-centric features make it easy to deploy.


3) Classic Reports: Classic Reports is a feature-complete reporting platform. Its ships with an easy-to-use report designer and a rich set of report controls, including pivot tables and charts so you can construct reports of unmatched elegance and informational clarity.


4) Dashboards: Whether building a dashboard for desktop or the web, you can enable the same data analysis features and incorporate the same visualization elements.


5) Spreadsheet Reports: The Spreadsheet Reports provides the UI experience your end users have come to expect from today's most popular office productivity suite.You can deliver Excel inspired functionality with minimal effort.


6) Wordsheet Reports: Wordsheet Reports is a Microsoft Word¬Æ inspired WinForms reporting platform, designed to simplify the way in which you and your end users generate business reports.


7) CrossTab Reports: You can merge any report type into single group report.
name: AbleView Technologies Private Limited

idea:
DIGI DEXXT is a Technology Solutions enabler catering to Critical Industrial Entities across Power & Utilities, Oil & Gas and Manufacturing sectors. We are a diversified team of professionals situated across the globe with a good mix of industry veterans and young professionals from both Critical industry and technology backgrounds. 


We aim to establish our practice on 3 major capabilities:

i. Technology Consulting - Deriving actionable data insights for optimization and remediation of Industry specific challenges via AI/ML

ii. Digital PaaS - Development of a digital platform enabling seamless capabilities for a client to manage digital functions such as predictive maintenance, demand forecasting, factory optimization, supply chain visibility backed by a strong foundation in Cybersecurity and compliance

iii. L&D - Translating industry experience into comprehensive learning modules for young professionals and technology enthusiasts via means of classroom and Online learning platforms
name: DIGI DEXXT

idea:
In the 21st Century, climate changes poses an existential threat to human race. Entire world is desperately trying to limit the global temperature rise to 1.5 degree Celsius. Fossil fuels have been primarily responsible for increased CO2 concentration in environment and efforts are being made to decarbonize the energy value chain. Large clean energy deployment programs are being put in place by almost all countries in the world. 


While traditionally these programs favor large grid scale installations, small scale renewable energy technologies are becoming increasingly viable. Rooftop solar, waster to energy, small wind, small gas turbines installations are seen frequently. At the same time, energy management technologies such as demand side management, demand response, remote monitoring aided by Internet of Things and Operational Technologies (IoT/OT) are evolving very fast and delivering decentralized solutions to consumers and utilities alike. 


Two other important trends can not be ignored. These are electrification of usage and emergence of battery storage technologies. Electrification of mobility in the form electric vehicles and green hydrogen fueled vehicles is reaching commercial viability. Similarly, electrification of cooking in the form of induction cooking and other appliances is gaining significant traction in urban areas. At the same time, battery costs have dropped by nearly 90% over last decade. As a result, it is neither necessary to consume electricity when generated nor required to transmit over long distances. 


These changes are going to have profound impact on the distribution grid and 'Future Distribution Grid' is going to be significantly different from the existing one. It is necessary to develop new technologies, solutions and business models which would enable the future distribution grid integrate small renewable energy resources, energy management technologies and battery storage technologies while enabling electrification of newer and newer applications across consumer segments. To reflect on this paradigm shift, we have developed the concept 'DRE3' which stands for Distribution, Renewable Energy and Energy Efficiency.



DRE3 Tech Solutions intends to develop suitable technologies & solutions and appropriate business models which would enable paradigm shift enshrined under DRE3 and democratize electricity supply and enable consumer choice. DRE3 Tech Solutions would develop and commercialize technologies from microgrid controllers to Peer to Peer trading platforms to enable this.
name: DRE3 Tech Solutions
